name: Find Color Different
description:
[Find Color Different]
Find a different color game. In all the color blocks, find a color and other colors are not the same.
Look for all color, choose one different color. The game will be more and more difficult. The score will be uploaded to the Game Center, You can view all the ranking.
Who is Find Color first ONE, me?
You can choose the classic mode or unlimited time mode to play. Have Fun~

1. Both iPhone&iPad all can play.
2. Both Horizontal or Vertical screen all can play.
3. Add a prompt during the game.

[color war]: Find Different Color, double player PK coming.
